Our impact


Institutions who are using and implementing our technology:

  • Boston College: Burns Antiphoner (Diva + CANTUS display methods)
  • Duke University Libraries: http://blogs.library.duke.edu/bitstreams/2014/06/06/leveling-up-our-document-viewer/
  • Omas@MITH: https://github.com/umd-mith/ema/tree/master/Omas (libmei + verovio)
  • Continuo@MITH: http://mith.us/continuo/ + https://github.com/umd-mith/continuo (Verovio)


Projects that we have contributed to:

  • Measuring Polyphony
  • Measuring Polyphony Editor
  • Verovio
  • MEI
  • music21
  • Django REST Framework
  • Internet Archives IIIF Support
  • IIP Image Server
  • Gamera
  • Serpy
  • PySolr
  • midi.js
